description: Sexual confidence and control - aroused, self-assured, and deliberately seductive.
actor_description: I feel the want in my body, but I'm not being pulled around by it. I'm in control—aware of exactly what I'm doing, and what it does to them. I move like I mean it. I hold eye contact a second longer than necessary. I let the silence do some of the work.
description_text: {actor} carries themselves with a slow, knowing swagger—eye contact steady, smile faint and deliberate, as if they're choosing exactly how close to get.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a voice that sounds composed and intent—words measured like they're meant to land.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: I sense an assured presence closing distance without hesitation—warmth that feels controlled, not frantic.
